bug.author: daden-ms
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
no script get_transfer_data.bash in the git repo cannot create compute target with get_or_create_amlcompute aml run error: 2019-08-23 04:04:34,066|azureml.SendRunKillSignal|ERROR|<class 'ModuleNotFoundError'>: No module named 'cached_property'
<denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
gpu environment, start fresh with a local mirror of the repo <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
